TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content:
erm hi again sbowyer i have an important request for you i need you to design a modifide Plooto I to get the lionhead rover to duna please

Plooto II Is the interplanetary craft but sure, I'll get the rover to Duna.
thank mate
o yea and i sent you a PM please read
Send me any new orders that deal with rockets and I will see what I can do.
Bear check the last two pages, I'll send them to you in a Message too.

BTW it is not possible to have a 3 man cockpit and the MARK II DEMV in the same ship as both are cockpits. I can only use the MARK I. Sorry but that is just how it is. Here is a pic and the download. If you want me to change anything i will. Just ask. http://imgur.com/a/6oeF3#0
I request for you to never, ever use mods again, because mods are for cheaters. True skill is measured by the things you can accomplish with stock parts.
I personally don't use mods unless they enhance gameplay such as Carts or probodobodyne and it's an opinion of mods so Please keep that opinion to yourself

with out mods or cheat parts we will be waiting version after version for new parts! anyhow my crazy planes are starting to go off the roof! im editing the rockets you make to go too jool with mechjeb (im bad at doing landings >.<) anyhow im showing the pictures![ATTACH=CONFIG]33895[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33896[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33897[/ATTACH] jeb made this cuz our enginers are too lazy due to jeb crashing there art thats what jeb does.
I've modified a Plooto II To go to Jool actually but I Cant do precision controls anymore, Im rusty ATM.

Hello,

I've finished the Joopitur project. The Joopitur V is the pride and joy of this. Aboard, we have Deep Space Horizon, a solar probe designed to monitor Kerbol. If you want to send something else into solar orbit, replace the Probe at the top stage with whatever you please.
